Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
Inductive inpb : pbtree -> pbtree -> Prop := inpb_leaf : forall t : pbtree, inpb t t | inpb_left : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbleft t1) | inpb_right : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbright t1) | inpb_node_l : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2) | inpb_node_r : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)

inpb_node_l : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
inpb_sind : forall P : pbtree -> pbtree -> SProp, (forall t : pbtree, P t t) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbleft t1)) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbright t1)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> forall p p0 : pbtree, inpb p p0 -> P p p0
inpb_ind : forall P : pbtree -> pbtree -> Prop, (forall t : pbtree, P t t) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbleft t1)) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbright t1)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> forall p p0 : pbtree, inpb p p0 -> P p p0
inpb_right : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbright t1)
inpb_left : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbleft t1)
cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
Inductive cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments cover_one _%type_scope Arguments cover_node _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
innodeR : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
Inductive inb (A : Type) : btree A -> btree A -> Prop := inleaf : forall t : btree A, inb t t | innodeL : forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2) | innodeR : forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2) Arguments inb [A]%type_scope Arguments inleaf _%type_scope Arguments innodeL _%type_scope Arguments innodeR _%type_scope

inpb_dec : forall a b : pbtree, {inpb a b} + {~ inpb a b}
height_pred_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
